golden_diagnosis: 多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, parkinsonian type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, cerebellar type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to
predict_diagnosis:
1. Spinal cord injury or disease
2. Multi-infarct dementia (vascular cognitive impairment)
3. Parkinson's disease or parkinsonism-related disorder
4. Normal pressure hydrocephalus
5. Diabetes-related neuropathy
6.abetic peripheral neuropathy
6. Central nervous system (CNS) infection or inflammation
7. Brain tumor or mass lesion
8. Metabolic disorder (e.g., vitamin deficiency, thyroid dysfunction)
9. Chronic kidney disease with neuropathy
10. Progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP) or similar disorder
